item.description:
Relating to Intimacy, Affection and Sex

There's often so much confusion, vulnerability, fear and control around this part of life. Talk it out and look at lots of practical options for communication, choice, action and behavior. Herb specialized as a sex therapist for many years and will stand in as a commentator for Everything You Wanted to Know and Were Too Afraid to Ask!

7:30-9:30pm
Refreshments served! Option to end at 10pm

$40 with sliding scale to $20 based on ability to pay

Herb Pearce has been leading workshops on relationship dynamics for over 30 years.

781 648 3737
www.herbpearce.com
herb@herbpearce.com
item.how_to_find_us: Arlington Heights, Corner of Tanager St. and Wollaston Ave.
item.name: Relating to Intimacy, Affection and Sexuality
